metadata.title: Shon Pazarker | Full Stack AI Engineer & Azure Architect
metadata.description: Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft specializing in AI agents, LLMs, full-stack development, Azure cloud architecture, and DevOps. Building intelligent systems from concept to production.

hero.title: Custom Business Landing Pages
hero.subtitle: I design and build custom business landing pages based on real reference sites, adapted to your content, goals, and industry. Perfect for real estate projects, agencies, consultants, service businesses, and early-stage startups.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: Reference-driven and content-first. Each project is efficient, predictable, and focused on delivery.

steps.1: Each project starts from 1–3 reference pages provided by you
steps.2: Scope is defined upfront based on reference complexity, existing content, and required sections
steps.3: This keeps the process efficient, predictable, and focused on delivery

customLayout.title: Custom Layout
customLayout.description: Unique design based on your provided references, tailored to your brand

responsive.title: Clean & Responsive
responsive.description: Fast-loading, mobile-first design that works perfectly on all devices

seoReady.title: SEO-Ready Structure
seoReady.description: Optimized for search engines with proper meta tags and semantic HTML

businessFocused.title: Business Focused
businessFocused.description: Designed to clearly present your business and drive conversions

analytics.title: Analytics Included
analytics.subtitle: Every page includes analytics setup from day one

clarity.title: Microsoft Clarity
clarity.description: Heatmaps, scroll tracking, and session recordings to understand user behavior

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.description: Traffic sources, page performance, and visitor insights

analytics.ownership: Analytics are installed in your own accounts — full data ownership and transparency

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.description: Pages are hosted and maintained with a small monthly hosting fee to cover infrastructure, uptime, and fast delivery.

updates.title: Ongoing Updates
updates.description: Post-launch updates and improvements are handled as needed. This includes content updates, additional sections, or analytics-driven improvements.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: A project typically begins with:

references.title: 1–3 Reference Pages
references.description: Examples of sites you like that match your vision

content.title: Existing Content
content.description: Text, images, and materials you already have (if available)

goals.title: Business Goal & Timeline
goals.description: What you want to achieve and when you need it

gettingStarted.note: I review the inputs and define the scope before starting any work.

hero.name: Shon Pazarker
hero.title: Full Stack AI Engineer & Azure Architect
hero.subtitle: Building intelligent systems end-to-end: from AI agents and LLMs to cloud infrastructure. I also share insights about technology and finance.

about.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a Senior Software Engineer at Microsoft, specializing in the intersection of AI and full-stack engineering. I build production-grade AI systems including Copilot agents, LLM-powered applications, and intelligent automation tools using technologies like MCP (Model Context Protocol) and semantic kernels.

My expertise spans the entire stack: from React and Next.js frontends, through .NET and Node.js backends, to Azure cloud architecture with Infrastructure as Code (Bicep, Terraform). I design scalable, secure systems with proper CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and DevOps best practices.

I also work extensively with Python, creating Jupyter notebooks to analyze big data in Kusto. I build agent evaluation frameworks that measure accuracy and use LLMs to iteratively improve system prompts based on evaluation test results.

frontend.name: Frontend
frontend.items: React, Angular, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS

cloud.name: Cloud & Azure
cloud.items: Microsoft Azure, Bicep, Terraform, ARM Templates

ai.name: AI & LLMs
ai.items: Copilot, GPT, Claude, MCP, Agentic AI, RAG

devops.name: DevOps
devops.items: CI/CD, Docker, Git, Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
items.description: Owned and delivered enterprise-grade backend capabilities within Microsoft Power Platform and Copilot Studio. Developed a production Kusto Copilot agent converting natural language to KQL. Led backend development of AI-powered Teams applications. Architected the Meeting Prep application from zero to production. Acted as technical leader and mentor, driving architectural decisions across frontend, backend, and AI systems.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.description: Strong front-end expertise with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Delivered projects for Microsoft, Salt Security, Unity (Bidalgo), 10Bis and more. Built apps from scratch using Webpack, Babel, ESLint, Storybook, and Cypress. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and integrated complex data flows using GraphQL and Apollo.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.description: Utilized Azure DevOps for version control and implementing robust CI/CD pipelines. Deployed secure applications on Windows Server environments. Independently developed multiple internal applications using Angular, .NET Core, and Node.js to enhance productivity and operational efficiency.

items.title: Investment Consulting
items.description: Building a personalized investment portfolio, stock analysis, and long-term investment strategy.

items.title: Real Estate Consulting
items.description: Finding income property opportunities in Israel and the US, deal analysis, and acquisition guidance.

items.title: Software Development
items.description: Building websites, applications, and custom systems for businesses and entrepreneurs.

items.title: Financial Analysis
items.description: Financial statement analysis, financial models, and company and stock valuations.
